title: In-Memory Time-Series Database
shortDescription: High-performance TSDB in modern C++ with columnar storage and lock-free data structures.
description: Implemented a concurrency-focused TSDB in modern C++ using columnar storage, parallel compression, and lock-free data structures to handle real-time ingestion and queries.

title: The Gem in I
shortDescription: Interactive language learning web app with Gemini and advanced TTS/STT capabilities.
description: Developed an interactive language learning web app leveraging Gemini, Angular, Firebase, and advanced TTS/STT (Google Cloud, ElevenLabs) to facilitate real-time conversational practice.

title: Document Level Embeddings for Github
shortDescription: ML pipeline for duplicate GitHub issue detection using SBERT embeddings.
description: Developed a pipeline for duplicate GitHub issue detection using SBERT embeddings and multi-metric evaluation (F1, cross-entropy, ROC-AUC) in PyTorch.

title: EnounceAI
shortDescription: Web app for English learning with GPT-3 and BERT-based NLP.
description: Built a web app (Express, Heroku) integrating GPT-3 for generating learning material and BERT-based NLP for precise correctness scoring, aiding immigrants in improving English semantics.
